answerText: Aeschylus [or Aiskhulos] [10] Aeschylus, like playwrights Sophocles and Euripides, worked in this dramatic form that accentuates suffering.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 7 | 1 | Literature | Classical | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Eteocles and Polynices perish in this playwright's Seven Against Thebes.  [10] Name this playwright who wrote about a figure chained to a rock in Prometheus Bound in addition to The Libation Bearers and The Persians.
